title: The Listerdale Mystery: A Short Story
description: Previously published in the print anthology The Golden Ball and Other Stories.After Mr. St. Vincent's death, his family is plunged into poverty. Living in reduced circumstances, they are surprised to find an elegant townhouse—with staff—for a suspiciously cheap rent. Why would Lord Listerdale lend them his home for such a low price, and why are the servants so accommodating?
author: Agatha Christie
